snippet: Finally clinching an elusive Australian Open crown is Andy Murray's number one goal for the new year but the Briton concedes that his hopes of success at Melbourne Park may rest on  champion Novak Djokovic having an off-day....
lead_paragraph: Finally clinching an elusive Australian Open crown is Andy Murray's number one goal for the new year but the Briton concedes that his hopes of success at Melbourne Park may rest on  champion Novak Djokovic having an off-day.

headline.print_headline: Murray Hopes for Djokovic Drop-Off at Melbourne Park
headline.main: Murray Hopes for Djokovic Drop-Off at Melbourne Park
